description: Sends an email with a SendGrid account through their API, not through the SMTP service.

username.description: username for logging into the SendGrid account.

password.description: password that corresponds to the username

from_name.description: the name you want to appear in the from field, i.e 'John Doe'

from_address.description: the address in the "from" field for the email

cc.description: a list of email addresses to cc

bcc.description: a list of email addresses to bcc

attachments.description: a list of relative or explicit paths of files you want to attach (7MB limit as per SendGrid docs)

headers.description: a dict to pass on as headers

to_addresses.description: a list with one or more recipient email addresses

api_key.description: sendgrid API key to use instead of username/password

html_body.description: whether the body is html content that should be rendered

subject.description: the desired subject for the email
